'''No Iudex Were Harmed During This Mission''' is a [[Badges|badge]] that can be obtained by playing the mission [[Small Crew, Big Plans]] on the island of [[Calamity Reef]].

Objective: <big style="color:yellow">Don't attack any Iudex.</big>
